AT.name: Baymax: Riesiges Robowabohu: Kampf in der Bucht
AT.description: Besiege mit Hiro und seinem die übermächtige Legion von Kampfrobotern! Spiele die tapferen Helden des Kinofilms und nutze ihre einzigartigen Fähigkeiten, um San Fransokyo vor der Invasion der Kampfroboter zu beschützen!

AU.name: Big Hero 6: Battle In the Bay
AU.description: Following on the heels of their super hero debut, the Big Hero 6 team has targeted a dangerous gangster named Yama and his legion of out of control fighting robots! The team is after Yama because he is a threat to their identity as Big Hero 6. Take control of the stars of the film in this action-packed combat platformer! Send robots flying across the screen as Hiro with his electro-mag gauntlets! Zoom through levels at top speed as GoGo! Slice and dice as Wasabi with his plasma blades! Smash and burn as Fred in his Kaiju monster super suit!

Smash and burn as Fred in his Kaiju monster super suit!

BE.name: Les Nouveaux Heros: Combat dans La Baie
BE.description: Aide Hiro et son équipe à yaincre les robots dans ce jeu de plateforme bourré d'action! Utilise les pouvoirs spéciaux des héros pour sauver la ville de San Fransokyo de l'invasion !

ES.name: Big Hero 6: Batalla en la bahía
ES.description: ¡Ayuda a Hiro y a su equipo a derrotar los BOTS (robots) en este juego lleno de acción! Conviértete en un personaje de pelicula y usa sus habilidades para salvar la ciudad de San Fransokyo de una invasión de BOT.

IT.name: Big Hero 6: Battaglia nella baia
IT.description: Aiuta Hiro e il suo team a sconfiggere i BOTS in questo gioco ricco di azione e di combattimento! Trasformati in uno dei personaggi del cinema e usa le loro abilità per salvare la città di San Fransokyo da un'invasione di robot da combattimento.

NL.name: Big Hero 6: Strijd in de baai
NL.description: Help Hiro en het team om de BOTS te verslaan in dit actievolle platform spel! Kruip in de huid van de sterren van de film en maak gebruik van hun skills om San Fransokyo te redden van een gevechtsbot-invasie!
